title: On the Hopf structure of $U_{p,q}(gl(1|1))$ and the universal ${\cal T}$-matrix of $Fun_{p,q}(GL(1|1))$
abstract: Using the technique developed by Fronsdal and Galindo (Lett. Math. Phys. 27 (1993) 57) for studying the Hopf duality between the quantum algebras $Fun_{p,q}(GL(2))$ and $U_{p,q}(gl(2))$, the Hopf structure of $U_{p,q}(gl(1|1))$, dual to $Fun_{p,q}(GL(1|1))$, is derived and the corresponding universal ${\cal T}$-matrix of $Fun_{p,q}(GL(1|1))$, embodying the suitably modified exponential relationship $U_{p,q}(gl(1|1))$ $\rightarrow$ $Fun_{p,q}(GL(1|1))$, is obtained.
